_sText:
Features:
+Disco with 3 songs +secrets +ct spawn +t spawn +weapon variation +kitchen +Theater +basketball +football +maze +skipping +grenade throw +knife arena +4 square +Hexa-Game +Break blocks +and lots of other stuff


34 Spawns, 24 T Spawns and 10 CT Spawns
The Map is well balanced has a well made Disco and
many Minigames like Hexa-Game, Break blocks, Football, Basketball,
Maze, Skipping, Nade Throw and a Knife Arena

Hexa-Game:
In the hexa game, each player chooses a field teams of terrorists and it is randomly decided which remains above As the only

Break-Blocks:
you have to survive break blocks as long as possible, but disappear with platforms from time to time more and more.

Nade-Throw(CT vs. T):
You throw HE Nades trough tiny holes, to the opposite side.
